Name: The Sargosian Abyss
About the game: The Sargosian Abyss is a challenging retro fantasy roguelike where you explore a procedurally generated dungeon and battle dangerous enemies using turn-based tactical combat. You control a party of four unfortunate souls who have been cast into the Sargosian Abyss as a sacrifice to the goddess of chaos. Armed with little more than crude weapons, you must guide your party as they battle the vile creatures that inhabit the ever-changing labyrinth. The game consists of 10 randomly generated levels, each filled with different monsters and items. You must carefully manage your party's resources as they explore the abyss and engage in tactical turn based combat with the dungeon's denizens. Features: Explore 10 randomly generated levels Customize your party with over seven different classes Select from over 30 unique skills and abilities Gather weapons, armor, and other items to aid your party Battle dozens of unique enemies in tactical grid-based combat Choose your level of difficulty with optional permadeath
